mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE WHERE RANK_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE (RANK_DATE, CATEGORY, PRDNO, SALES, RANK_NO) SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS RANK_DATE, -- 오늘 날짜 '0' AS CATEGORY, -- 전체 랭킹(카테고리 없음) → NOT NULL 충족 p.PRDNO AS PRDNO, -- 상품 번호 NVL(SUM(pp.PPMAPSTOCK), 0) AS SALES, -- 총 판매량 RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(SUM(pp.PPMAPSTOCK), 0) DESC) AS RANK_NO FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PAY_PRODUCT_MAPPING pp ON p.PRDNO = pp.PRDNO GROUP BY p.PRDNO

INSERT INTO PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE (RANK_DATE, CATEGORY, PRDNO, SALES, RANK_NO) SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS RANK_DATE, p.PRDSUBCATE AS CATEGORY, p.PRDNO AS PRDNO, NVL(SUM(pp.PPMAPSTOCK), 0) AS SALES, RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY p.PRDSUBCATE ORDER BY NVL(SUM(pp.PPMAPSTOCK), 0) DESC ) AS RANK_NO FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PAY_PRODUCT_MAPPING pp ON p.PRDNO = pp.PRDNO WHERE TRIM(p.PRDSUBCATE) IS NOT NULL AND p.PRDSUBCATE <> '0' GROUP BY p.PRDSUBCATE, p.PRDNO
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE WHERE RANK_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND SKIN_TYPE IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE (RANK_DATE, CATEGORY, PRDNO, SALES, RANK_NO, SKIN_TYPE, CREATED_AT) SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS RANK_DATE, skinType AS CATEGORY, -- 피부타입 코드와 동일하게 저장하여 PK 충돌 방지 prdNo, viewCount AS SALES, rankNo, skinType, SYSDATE AS CREATED_AT FROM (SELECT u.USERSKIN AS skinType, v.PRDNO AS prdNo, COUNT(*) AS viewCount, RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY u.USERSKIN ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC ) AS rankNo FROM VIEWED_PRODUCT v JOIN USERS u ON u.USERNO = v.USERNO WHERE v.VPREGDATE >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY u.USERSKIN, v.PRDNO) WHERE rankNo <= 10 -- 피부타입별 TOP10만 저장
